author: Craig CustanceESPN Senior Writer
description: Sidney Crosby and the other Penguins stars can't repeat all by themselves. Pittsburgh is a win away from a return trip to the Stanley Cup finals thanks to a next-man-upÂ approach and newcomers like Carter Rowney who have shined this postseason.
title: Penguins run powered by collective effort

author: Craig CustanceESPN Senior Writer
description: Not a rash of injuries, not facing two of the league's top four teams nor double OT in Game 7 were enough to hold back Sidney Crosby and a Penguins team utterly determined to give themselves a chance to repeat as Stanley Cup champions.
title: Penguins, Crosby refuse to lose
